titles.title: To include B20 biodiesel blends as an alternative fuel for corporate average fuel economy purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
5/23/2007--Introduced.
Amends corporate average fuel economy (CAFE) standards provisions to include B20 biodiesel blend as an alternative fuel for purposes of such standards.
